attributes.action: Stop Thames Water disposing Raw Sewage (inon emergency) to The River Windrush.
attributes.background: As per ref as televised on "Countryfile" recently, Thames Water are disposing of Raw Sewage (in non-emergency situations) into the River Windrush. Bourton on the Water to Witney areas are affected.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask Parliament to make it a legal requirement for water companies to monitor Combined sewage overflows (CSOs).
